name: shape-tape

scripts.generate-docs: npx typedoc --readme none --entryDocument index.md --githubPages false --sourceLinkTemplate 'https://github.com/paulbarmstrong/shape-tape/blob/main/{path}#L{line}' --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --out docs src/index.ts
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run generate-docs && npm run test

author: Paul B. Armstrong
description: A TypeScript/JavaScript library to help with runtime validation of structured data.
